snippet.title: Candela: Colorless Dreams - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Candela is a mysterious and atmospheric puzzle platformer set in a desolate, post-apocalyptic land. Manipulate blue and red flames to solve puzzles, master challenging platforming, and uncover secrets.

Wishlist it now, on steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2896610/Candela__Colorless_Dreams/
